template.name: ginkgo
htest
template.value:
mockService := mock.NewMockService(gomock.NewController(t))
service = mockService
mockService.EXPECT().$NAME$(gomock.Any()).Return(nil, nil) resp, err := $NAME$(context.Background(), license.New$NAME$Request()) assert.Nil(t, err) assert.NotNil(t, resp) assert.Equal(t, int32(0), resp.BaseResp.StatusCode)
mockService.EXPECT().$NAME$(gomock.Any()).Return(nil, errors.New("test")) resp, err = $NAME$(context.Background(), license.New$NAME$Request()) assert.Nil(t, err) assert.NotNil(t, resp) assert.NotEqual(t, int32(0), resp.BaseResp.StatusCode)
